DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT  
Address1 as SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1
,State as SITE_RAW_STATE
,City as SITE_RAW_CITY
,PostalCodeID as SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE
,StoreID as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER
,Operation_ID
,SITE_NAME
,B_PUBID
,B_SourceID
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,B_SourceID as FS_SITE_ID  
,B_PubID as FP_SITE_ID
,'HomeStoreOperationProfitCenterTracking' as B_CLASSNAME
FROM RsmSiteSubscriber.Opc_Tracker_Incremental_activity_V
Where Activity_Type in('Delete')

SELECT
 Address1
,State
,City
,PostalCodeID
,StoreID
,Operation_ID
,B_PUBID
,B_SourceID
,SITE_NAME
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,Activity_Type
,IsActiveType
FROM RsmSiteSubscriber.Opc_Tracker_Incremental_activity_V
Where Activity_Type in('Delete')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    S.RecStatus AS STORESTATUS,
    S.StoreID,
    S.Name AS STORISName,
    S.SourceID,
    S.locnType,
    S.RegionID,
    S.Address1,
    S.City,
    S.State,
    S.Distribution_StoreID,
    S.DateCreated,
    S.DateChanged 
FROM EDW.Store_temp S

SELECT 
    ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ChangeType = 'INSERT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as InsertCount,
    ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ChangeType = 'UPDATE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as UpdateCount,
    ISNULL(COUNT(*), 0) as TotalChanges
FROM EDW.EDW_RETAIL_CORPORATE_Store_Log 
WHERE ProcessDate = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)

message.value: @concat('Store CDC: ', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.InsertCount, ' new stores, ', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.UpdateCount, ' updated stores')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT S.RecStatus AS STORESTATUS, S.StoreID, S.Name AS STORISName, S.SourceID, S.locnType, S.RegionID, S.Address1, S.City, S.State, S.Distribution_StoreID, S.DateCreated, S.DateChanged 
FROM EDME_DataFactory.Store S
where S.RecStatus in ('U','N')
/*
A: means active once, used in the past to transafer store ID from character to 3 digits.
U: means currently used ( might include some re-active closed stores.)
D: No longer in use-deleted, maybe mistakenly entered,
S: suspended? A lot of junk orders are saved here.
N: A step preparation before turns to U.
*/

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ChangeType='INSERT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS InsertCount,
 ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ChangeType='UPDATE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS UpdateCount,
 ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ChangeType='DELETE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS DeleteCount,
  ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TotalChanges 
  FROM EDW.EDW_RETAIL_CORPORATE_Store_Log 
  WHERE Rundate = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)

SELECT 
    StoreID, 
    ChangeType, 
    FORMAT(ProcessDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS ProcessDate,
    ChangeDetails 
FROM EDW.EDW_RETAIL_CORPORATE_Store_Log 
WHERE RunDate = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) 
ORDER BY RunDate DESC, ChangeType DESC, StoreID DESC

message.value: @concat('Store CDC: ', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.InsertCount, ' new stores, ', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.UpdateCount, ' updated stores')

@concat('Store CDC: ', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.InsertCount, ' new stores, ', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.UpdateCount, ' updated stores,', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.DeleteCount, ' Deleted stores')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    S.RecStatus AS STORESTATUS,
    S.StoreID,
    S.Name AS STORISName,
   -- Unit.UntUnitDesc AS FinanceUnitDesc,
    S.SourceID,
    S.locnType,
    S.RegionID,
    S.Address1,
    S.City,
    S.State,
    S.Distribution_StoreID,
    S.DateCreated,
    S.DateChanged 
FROM EDME_DataFactory.Store S

SELECT 
    ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ChangeType = 'INSERT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as InsertCount,
    ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ChangeType = 'UPDATE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as UpdateCount,
    ISNULL(COUNT(*), 0) as TotalChanges
FROM EDW.EDW_RETAIL_CORPORATE_Store_Log 
WHERE ProcessDate = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)

message.value: @concat('Store CDC: ', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.InsertCount, ' new stores, ', activity('Get Change Count').output.firstRow.UpdateCount, ' updated stores')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT B_CLASSNAME,
B_SOURCEID,
B_PUBID,
B_CREDATE,
OWNER_FIRST_NAME,
OWNER_LAST_NAME,
RAW_OWNER_PHONE,
RAW_CONTACT_EMAIL,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID, B_PUBID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SD_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_OWNER WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_NAME,
RAW_SITE_ADDRESS_LINE1,
RAW_SITE_ADDRESS_LINE2,
RAW_SITE_CITY,
RAW_SITE_STATE_CODE,
RAW_SITE_POSTAL_CODE,
RAW_SITE_COUNTRY_CODE,
SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
F_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY,
FD_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID, B_PUBID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SD_SITE_LEGAL_ENTITY WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

SELECT * FROM (

RAWADDRESS_LINE1,

RAWCITY,

RAWCOUNTRY_CODE,

STACITY,

RAW_FAX,

RAW_CS_EMAIL,

RAW_SERVICE_PHONE,
STD_SERVICE_PHONE,
SERVICE_PHONE_STATUS_CODE,

FS_WAREHOUSE_PARENT,

LEGACY_STORE_NUMBER,
LEGACY_ERP_DATABASE_NAME,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID, B_PUBID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SD_SITE_MAIN WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL     WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

PROGRAM_NAME,
PROGRAM_START_DATE,
PROGRAM_END_DATE,
FP_SITE_MAIN,
FS_SITE_MAIN,
SITE_PROGRAM_ID,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SITE_PROGRAM_ID ORDER BY B_UPDDATE DESC) RowOneWins
    FROM SA_SITE_PROGRAM WITH (NOLOCK) 
) SL WHERE SL.RowOneWins = 1

fileName.value: @concat('Record Search - Data Export - Record Info _ Contact Details_', formatDateTime(utcnow(), 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss'), '.xlsx')

properties.description: This Dataflow loads RDC info to Semarchy staging
